= Introduction =

= Details =
Installing lua 5.1:

    wget http://www.lua.org/ftp/lua-5.1.X.tar.gz <br>
    tar xvfz lua-5.1.X.tar.gz <br>
    cd lua-5.1.X/ <br>
    make macosx <br>
    sudo make install <br>

Installing glfw 2.6:

wget http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/glfw/glfw-2.6.tar.bz2
tar xvfj glfw-2.6.tar.bz2
cd glfw/
chmod +x compile.sh
./compile.sh
make macosx-gcc

Installing FreeImage 3.12.0:
<blockquote>
wget http://downloads.sourceforge.net/freeimage/FreeImage3120.zip
unzip FreeImage3120.zip
cd FreeImage
make -f Makefile.osx
sudo make install
</blockquote>
Installing fftw 3.2:

wget http://www.fftw.org/fftw-3.2.1.tar.gz
tar xvfz fftw-3.2.1.tar.gz
cd fftw-3.2.1/
./configure
make
sudo make install

Installing FMOD 3.75:

wget http://www.fmod.org/index.php/release/version/fmodapi375mac.zip
unzip fmodapi375mac.zip
cd fmodapi375mac
sudo cp api/inc/* /usr/local/include/
sudo cp api/lib/* /usr/local/lib/
